text: Kagalwadi Junction Kagalvadi is a village in Chamarajanagar district of Karnataka state, India. ==Location== Kagalvadi is located between Chamarajanagar town and Yelandur town. ==Postal code== There is a post office in Kagalvadi and the postal code is 571117. ==Economy== The economy of the village is mostly agrarian. Indian Overseas Bank has a branch at Kagalvadi. ==See also== * Rechamballi * Yelandur * Chamarajanagar * Irasavadi ==References== Category:Villages in Chamarajanagar district
title: Kagalvadi
